channel.title: Publications on Dang-Khoa's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Publications on Dang-Khoa's blog

item.title: Analysis of Algorithms
item.description: A Galactic Algorithms How do we analyze an algorithm Implement a correct and good code of the algorithm. Select the cost model for the algorithm, e.g, comparisons or other costs. The cost model should be independent from the implementation. Decide the input model, e.g, randomness and other properties. Build mathematics models of the algorithms [The hard part]. Break down the operations in the algorithm. Formulate a mathematical problem.

item.title: C++ is better than C
Estimate object size from a reference object
item.description: Estimating object’s area by multiple images My main idea is to use essential matrix or maybe fundamental matrix to find the relationship between the image coordinate and the real world coordinate. There are two main problems which makes me struggle alot: How is the essential matrix if two cameras are diffent? Specicially, if two cameras have two distinct focal lengths and distortions, how we can formulate the relationship matrix between them?

item.title: Crytocurrency Technology
item.description: Crytographic Hash Function A mathematic function: Input: any string Output: fixed-size output (usually 256 bits) Efficiently computable Properties: Collision-free It is very difficult to find $x$ and $y$ for a crytographic hash function such that: $ x\neq y {\text and} H(x)= H(y)$ What is a quantitative measures for difficult level to find a collision? One method: try $2^130$ randomly chosen inputs, we can got 99.8% chance of collision.

item.title: The Josephus problem
item.description: The Josephus problem is one of the famous problem in Concrete Mathematics since the authors used the problem throught several chapters, especially in Chapter 1 and Chapter 3 when the authors intruduce the recurrence relations. Firstly, let express the problem and dicuss several variants.

item.title: Extend CVPR17 paper to the journal version
item.description: Logs 2017-12-19 Update the supervised version of sah. 2017-12-21 The data is damn huge and hence I am not able to store all conv5 features into a cell. Therefore, I decide to split data into 3 parts, namely training set, testing test while extracting. 2018-01-08 anh Tuan’s experiment results % OXFORD5k % Params: L=32 gamma=10.000000 mu=1000000000.000000 lambda=0.010000 beta=0.100000 MAP = 0.135326 % Params: L=32 gamma=10.000000 mu=100000000.000000 lambda=0.010000 beta=0.100000 MAP = 0.

item.title: StayingFit
item.description: Content What’s my motivation? The first assignment in the course is to describe the motivation why I enrolled the class? My respond is to gain more energy for other activities such as efficient working, research. I feel that I got exhausted easily and was not able to work in a long period. Physical Exercise and Guidelines Benefits Emotional Benefits Improved coping skills. Hell Happier! Imroved cognition. Better overall mood.

item.title: C++20 news
item.description: C++20 Features Range-based for statements with initializer With C++20, we can initialize local variables inside the range-based for. For example: { T thing = f(); for (auto& x: thing.items()) { mutate(&x); log(x); } } With the new feature, we can shorten the code: for (T thing= f(); auto& x : thing.items()) { mutate(&x); log(x); } Bit-casting object representations The proposal Get the bits of an object. The new header <bit> Operator <=> It compress the whole comparison operators of the total order into a single symbol <=> (as I understood).

item.title: Introduction to Java Memory
item.description: I mostly use the Algorithms’Sedgewick as a material for the blogspot.

Deadline: 15-11-2017. Outline Direction: the retrieval problem. Target on binary codes. Binary constraints and current limitations. Papers Introduction Image retrieval: give details about a content-based image retrieval (CBIR). Experiments :todo:cvpr18: TODO Writing the paper * [X] Apply the CVPR18 format * [X] Write the introduction * [ ] Write the Experiment section (13/11/2017) Experiments * [X] Run SSDN on: * [X] L = 128 * [X] L = 256 * [X] L = 512 * [ ] t-SNE visualization * [ ] SSDH L=256 Logs 2017-11-12 I could not replicate the result of SSDH on Oxford5k.

End2End SH-BDNN to submit to TIP Logs 11/09/17 I think we should change the dataset, it seems that SUN397 could not be applied for the algorithms. Bit of index 0th is always 1. The result is quite promising. Hope that it can outperform ITQ-CCA. 12/09/17 The result is very good. It is comparable with the Augmented Lagrangian(AL) method. I guest that the end2end version can outperform the ECCV paper.

Face recognition experiments VGG-Faces Setups Gathering data Collect classes. Create folders corresponding to the classes. File Format Each line in the file provides an image url, a bounding box and some other attributes. Each line represents: id url left top right bottom pose detection_score curation id: Integer id for an image. url: The weblink for the image. [left top right bottom] the bounding box for an image.

Tìm kiếm theo chuỗi Fibonacci Mình không tìm được từ nào tiếng Việt có thể dịch được từ “Fibonaccian Searching”, nếu “binary searching” có thể dịch là “tìm kiếm nhị phân”, thì “Fibonaccian Searching” không có ngữ nghĩa gì nhiều. Nguồn gốc thuật toán này xuất phát từ bài tập 1.4.22 (Algorithms, Fourth Edition, Sedgewick). Ngoài ra đây cũng là một nội dung được đề cập trong TAoCP - Vol 3.

ICASSP18 Paper TODO Introduction add references : a visual representation summarize SH end-to-end methods how they deal with binary constraints change method name -> SH-E2E !! learning scheme Method Start with mathematical definition of the problem fix the formula in Algorithm in the formula remove redundant sentences. Experiments NUS-WIDE KSH (removed) L=8 L=16 L=24 L=32 BRE L=8 L=16 L=24 L=32 Compare to other end-to-end networks 10/25/2017

I found the book on Goodreads with very good reviews. Since it is quite short (186 pages ), I will try to finish a book in 2 hours. The fist impression is that the book quality is very good. I like the color of papers. Read various materials of different subjects. Books Pronunciation Workshop. Barron IETLS Writing. Good to Great. Longman Preparation Course for the TOEFL Test.
MatConvNet problems Errors occur during preparing GPUs. Fix gcc incompatible problem: [](https://github.com/vlfeat/matconvnet/issues/967#issuecomment-304977445)

NUS-WIDE Setups How-to 1. Load list of concepts (`Concepts81.txt`) 2. Initialize tags which size of (num_images x num_concepts) 2. For each concept 2.1 Load the corresponding groundtruths of the concepts 2.2 Append to tags 3. EndFor We can download about ~220k images. ITQ-CCA Parameters SH-BDNN Parameters Code_length = 8 1e-5 5e-2 1e-2 5e-7 1e-3 mAP = 55.66 1e-2 5e-2 1e-2 5e-3 5e2 mAP = 47.47 1e-5 5e-2 1e-2 5e-7 1e-2 mAP = 54.
Damn it, I don’t understand even a damn thing.
Descriptions just BS. I do not want to do with this project anymore.

multiple variables in Python with statement with A() as a, B() as b, C() as c: do_something(a, b, c) source Handling exception as variable try: do_stuff() except Exception as e: print_error(e) print without newline print("hello ", end='') print(", world") download a file import urllib.request, urllib.parse, urllib.error try: f = urllib.request.urlopen(url) data = f.read() except urllib.error.URLError as e: # handle errors print(e) # write data with oepn(outfile, 'wb') as fout: fout.
Refactor the whole project. use images.set to count Put all parameters into a struct Use meta.labels to count number of classes.
Introduction Definition Exploration-exploitation dilemma Resources Chinese Room

Sun397 Parameters Notes Never touch the dimension reduction layer. Maximum 2 code instances can run at a time. lambda5 is quite crucial. If we increase, i.e. 10, the network suffers overfitting. On the other hand, the accuracy decreases if we use a smaller value. lambda2=5e-4 seems to be a good parameter. There is no different between 5e-4 and 5e-6 , do need to decrease the value. Increasing lambda2 leads to poor mAP?
Sun397 - SH-BDNN parameters

Face Verification Experiments Settings 2017-11-09 Currently I could not figure out how to deal with the lfw dataset. Maybe I have to replicate another paper and ensure that the evaluation protocol is correct. - [ ] Download data and source code of simonyan13 paper. - [ ] Run the demo and check if the setting is correct. - [ ] Which setting is used? The repertoire method is an approach to find a closed-form for recurrence relations and sum of series. The method is introduced in Chapter 1 of ConMath but most readers at the first time struggled with it. Through the book, especially in Chapter 1 and 2, the repertoire method demonstrates its ability to solve many sums and recurrences. However, I honestly admit that it is quite difficult to apply and do not fully understand how it works.
Today is a fantastic day. Because I over-drunk yesterday, I could not wake up till 12pm.

3 Papers Rejected I did not even think that the hashing paper would get rejected. It was a good paper with good motivations and well-written. ANW, Toan and Professor decided to submit the paper to the TMM journal. I have not been mood since the morning. I do not want to do any research.

Setup a new colorscheme After taking a while to find a suitable colorscheme, I finally picked jellybeans. It seems very cool compared to the previous scheme. What next? I don’t know. Now I am not having any motivations or mood to do anything. I just heard the story from Kwotsin: If I have very good networking on Linkedin, I can easily got interviews from many companies and unicorn startups.

Some much pain while writing diary by English because of the lack of vocabulary. However, I have to practice using English everyday since it will help me improve writing skill. I intent to submit the hashing paper to CVPR18. Just update new content and add more experiments. Do not know if it will work or not. Currently, I want to get more motivations in order to pursue my goals. I do not know.
I have been bored all day long. Could not figure out how to concentrate working and finishing the paper as soon as possible.

Do not know why I am highly motivate to write the paper right now. Basically, the introduction is quite good (in my opinion). At least, I see I do have to modify the large amount of text in the section. The most difficult part is writing the Experiment section. Why? Because it is the weakest part in the whole paper. If the paper this time meets good reviewers, I am quite sure that it will be accepted in CVPR18.

A new week for a new hope Things to do today: [ ] Revise the CVPR paper. Seriously, I am quite tired of the paper. Why? It got rejected soo many times (twice?). Plus, I feel bored of doing research. Currently, I could not figure out What I have to do next. See. The problem is that there are so many jobs for deep learning. But I hate it.

Information-theoratic lower bound of comparison-based sortings The proof uses: - Information theory: Shannon entropy. - Stirling approximation. Still, I do not get why quantity $-n$ in which $n$ is number of elements in the array: $$ nH - n $$ where $H$ is Shannon entropy. I suspect that it comes from the Stirling approximation. Maybe Sedgewich wants a strictly inequality?

Got up at 4 am to watch the match between Federer and Alex and later I could not sleep again. Since then, I thought that if I want to get up early everyday. Just put some tasks to do early, for example, daily programming in the morning (HackerRank, leetcode, etc). I can even study English in the morning, it seems to be a good idea. I definitely consider this plan and will try it next week.
I just have done the CVPR18 submission. Surprisingly, I got 3 papers submitted from the hashing paper, the deep learning on mobile paper and finally the uxpected Tuan paper.

ATP Finals Fedex just lost in the semifinal against Goffin. I suspect that Fedex got injured or something. The last 2 sets is terrible. I do not think he even performed such tennis level and eventually was defeated by Goffin. However, overall it is one of the best season of Fedex. In the match between Fedex and Raonic, when he was falling, I thought that his professional career was over.
Such a good day. I mean I have completed all tasks which is unexpected.

Working ITQ results on the dataset Landmark Check Face Verification Protocol The book “Algorithms” of Sedgewick is truly interesting. I means I could read it all day long and do not feel exhaustived. Conservely, TAoCP is difficult to follow and each day you only can read 2 or 3 pages.
Just do nothing. But I love writing and programming all day long. It is such fun activity. Just love it. Damn it, damn my job now. Just simply just hate it.
Wow, Concrete Mathematics contains almost famous dynamic programming problems. It looks fascinating when the authors contructs generating functions from these problems.
A new member to the team Today my team has a new member. She comes from Vietnam and is a friend of Tuan. I already have known her since CVPR17. She seems friendly.

Wow, I waken up early today. Just keep progress and maybe I get up early and make it to be a habit. Leetcode I am quite afraid of LeetCode, practicing programming is frustrated. Sometimes I do not feel comfortable when reading the problem description. However, I know that I have to force myself to concentrate to the practice otherwise I can not achieve what I have planned. There is nobody can help me have full of energy in order to program day by day other than me.
Amortized analysis TIP17 journal

A terrible mistake I just found out that the MNIST dataset is configured wrongly. If the reviewers of CIASSP discover the errors, it is a huge mistake in the paper and in case if I was him, I would reject the paper. I am so disappointed at myself.
The TIP17 journal I still have some experiment need to be conducted. Fortunately, I thought I could get the result tomorrow.

Conspiracy theory When studying about Deus Ex, I learnt many termologies in the conspiracy theory, some of them are very famous: Black helocopter. Vaccine controversies. Area 51. Illuminati. Majestic 12. -
In the morning, I have been readlly in a good mood. Just keep working and enjoy life. Working

# Plan and Logs 2017 Plan There are only 2 months remaining and I feel like so many things need to be done. Wow!. The vimwiki is so fast (and furious). I just love it at the first sight. Working Project Drone TIP journal 2017 CVPR18: Hashing retrieval without Human intervention. Extend CVPR17 * Books Selected Papers on Computer Science Kien Tran IELTS Handbook [ ] Workflow Use vimwiki for personal notes and miscellaneous drafts.
